miniapp.name: Blockit Pro - Personal Token Security
miniapp.description: Automatically discover tokens in your wallet and scan only those for risky approvals. More efficient, more personal, more secure.

features.name: Targeted Approval Scanning
features.description: Only scans approvals for tokens with balances - faster and more relevant

features.name: Real-time Balance Checking
features.description: Live blockchain queries to show current token balances

features.name: One-Click Revoke
features.description: Revoke risky approvals with ~$0.01 gas cost on Base network

features.name: Risk Assessment
features.description: Categorizes protocols by risk level and provides safety recommendations

2.0.0: Improved efficiency by scanning only owned tokens
Enhanced UI with token balance display
Optimized for Base network gas costs
1.0.0: Initial release with predefined token scanning
Basic approval detection and revoke functionality
